Advanced_Assault_Rifle_Snipe.help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.
Advanced_Assault_Rifle_Snipe.targetHelp: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

Advanced_Assault_Rifle_M30_Grenade.help: Launches a Grenade at long range from beneath the barrel of your Assault Rifle. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

Advanced_Assault_Rifle_Web_Grenade.help: The Malta Tactical Ops soldier has snared you in his Web Grenade. You are Immobilized, cannot fly, and your attack speed is reduced.
Advanced_Assault_Rifle_Web_Grenade.targetHelp: The Special Ops soldier has snared you in their Web Grenade. You are Immobilized, cannot fly, and your attack speed is reduced.

Advanced_Assault_Rifle_EMP_Grenade.help: This grenade can unleash a massive pulse of electromagnetic energy on impact. This EMP can affect machines, and is even powerful enough to affect synaptic brain patterns. It will incapacitate all foes in its radius. Additionally, most machines and robots will take moderate high damage.
Advanced_Assault_Rifle_EMP_Grenade.shortHelp: PBAoE, Foe Hold, Special vs. Robots, Self -Recovery
Advanced_Assault_Rifle_EMP_Grenade.targetHelp: You are held immobile by the EMP Pulse Grenade, and your Regeneration Rate has been reduced.
